description: Celeste (Open World) is a randomizer for the original Celeste. In this acclaimed platformer created by ExOK Games, you control Madeline as she attempts to climb the titular mountain, meeting friends and obstacles along the way.  Progression is found in unlocking the ability to interact with various objects in the areas, such as springs, traffic blocks, feathers, and many more. Please be safe on the climb.

v1.0.0.description: Initial Release of the Celeste Archipelago Open World mod.
v1.0.0.failed_to_load: Item and Location Options cannot be specified multiple times
v1.0.0.title: v1.0.0

v1.0.1.description:
v1.0.1 of the Archipelago Open World mod for Celeste.

Changelog since v1.0.0:

```
### Quality of Life:
- Hint Message Boxes are now properly colored
- Added Toggle for Server Messages appearing in the Message Queue
- Added more Trap Link names
### Bug Fixes:
- Fixed Prologue ending crash when `Require Cassettes` was active
- Non-player objects no longer interact with inactive Springs
- Pink Clouds are now uncollidable when they should be
- Logic Fixes:
  - Celestial Resort A
    - Room 02-a now has properly-connected regions
    - Room 09-b North exit is properly marked one-way
  - Mirror Temple A
    - Room a-00x Strawberry now requires no items
    - Entrance Key and Room a-15 Strawberry (and related rooms) now properly require Swap Blocks
  - Reflection A
    - Rock Bottom checkpoint no longer logically allows you to go backwards
```
v1.0.1.failed_to_load: Item and Location Options cannot be specified multiple times
v1.0.1.title: v1.0.1

v1.0.2.description:
v1.0.2 of the Archipelago Open World mod for Celeste.

Changelog since v1.0.1:

```
### Quality of Life:
- Some tracker-relevant data is now added to DataStorage
### Bug Fixes:
- Fixed TrapLink dying on unknown trap names
- Changed to be handling "Ghost" for Trap Link as intended, instead of "Ghost Trap"
- Logic Fixes:
  - Old Site B
    - Room 02b now requires Dash Refills to pass through
  - Mirror Temple A
    - Room d-15 Strawberry 2 now requires Dash Refills
  - Mirror Temple B
    - Redid much of the logic around the Central Chamber Keys usage
  - Core B
    - Room c-01 now requires Springs to reach top
  - Core C
    - Room 03 now requires Springs to Level Clear and Golden Strawberry locations
  - Farewell
    - Room j-15 is no longer accessible going backwards from Farewell checkpoint
```
v1.0.2.failed_to_load: Item and Location Options cannot be specified multiple times
v1.0.2.title: v1.0.2

v1.0.3.description:
v1.0.3 of the Archipelago Open World mod for Celeste.

Changelog since v1.0.2:

```
### Quality of Life:
- Added a few common alternative Item names for ease of hinting
### Bug Fixes:
- Connection blips should no longer cause the strawberry location count to desync
- Goal Complete message now sends before the credits
- DeathLink and certain traps are now disabled during the credits
- Fixed default hair colors
- Fixed Feather hair length
- Logic Fixes:
  - Forsaken City A
    - `Room 6 Strawberry` now does not have any requirements attached
    - `Room 6c` had an errant region connection removed
  - Mirror Temple A
    - `Room d-09` now properly requires Swap Blocks to traverse
  - The Summit A
    - `Room b-01` now properly requires Springs instead of Dash Refills
  - The Summit B
    - `Room c-01` now requires Springs
    - `Room d-01` now required Dash Refills
  - Farewell
    - `Room intro-02-launch` now properly requires `Blue Clouds` to be accessed
    - The `Red Booster` from the Power Source hub can now be dashed out of, making the logic for accessing `Room e-00yb` correct
```
v1.0.3.failed_to_load: Item and Location Options cannot be specified multiple times
v1.0.3.title: v1.0.3

v1.0.4.description:
v1.0.4 of the Archipelago Open World mod for Celeste.

Changelog since v1.0.3:

```
### Quality of Life:
- APWorld version is now printed to the game log on connect
### Bug Fixes:
- Forsaken City A - `Room 5 Strawberry` and Room 5z Strawberry` are no longer swapped
- Fixed an intermittent crash that could occur if a brief network drop occurred
- Added missing location for `Core A - Cassette`
- Fixed Jellyfish grabbox lingering after destruction
- Logic Fixes:
  - Forsaken City A
    - `Room 9b` now logically connects backwards to `Room 9`
  - Celestial Resort A
    - `Golden Strawberry` now has the correct logical requirements
  - Mirror Temple B
    - `Room d-03` now also requires `Swap Blocks` for traversal
    - `Golden Strawberry` now has the correct logical requirements for Keys
  - The Summit A
    - `Room b-01` now properly requires Springs instead of Dash Refills
  - Farewell
    - `Room a-00` now logically connects backwards to `Room intro-03-space`
    - `Room h-00b` now logically connects backwards to `Room g-06`
```

v1.0.4.title: v1.0.4

v1.0.5.description:
v1.0.5 of the Archipelago Open World mod for Celeste.

Changelog since v1.0.4:

```
### Quality of Life:
- Various improvements to the in-game journal
- The name of the current room is briefly displayed when you enter it (togglable via Mod Option)
- APWorld version is printed to the spoiler log
- More trap names are supported for TrapLink
### Bug Fixes:
- You can no longer go backwards from the `Farewell - Event Horizon` checkpoint room to the `Empty Space` heart room
- Traps are now prevented in the `Mirror Temple - void` room
- Logic Fixes:
  - Farewell
    - Accessing `Room d-03` now only requires `Red Boosters` from the bottom entrance of `Room d-00`
```

v1.0.5.title: v1.0.5

v1.0.6.description:
v1.0.6 of the Archipelago Open World mod for Celeste.

Changelog since v1.0.5:

```
### Bug Fixes:
- Game should no longer lag on sending locations
- DeathLinks should occur more consistently
- The Message Queue is now cleared on disconnecting from the server
- Logic Fixes:
  - Old Site A
    - Logic now allows for going backwards from the `Awake` checkpoint
  - Mirror Temple A
    - `Room b-01c Strawberry` and `Room b-10 Strawberry` no longer erroneously require `Red Boosters`
  - Reflection A
    - Logic now allows for going backwards from the `Reflection` checkpoint
  - Reflection B
    - Logic now allows for going backwards from the `Reflection` checkpoint
  - Farewell
    - `Power Source Key 2` now logically requires `Dash Switches` and `Double Dash Refills` as it should
```
v1.0.6.title: v1.0.6

v1.0.7.description:
v1.0.7 of the Archipelago Open World mod for Celeste.

Changelog since v1.0.6:

```
### Bug Fixes:
- `Core Blocks` and `Fire and Ice Balls` will now show in the journal if Farewell is enabled and Core is not enabled
- Connection timeout is increased to theoretically improve performance when connected to a particularly congested server.
```
v1.0.7.title: v1.0.7
